title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.3 - Notification to data subjects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.3 - Notification to data subjects

State Regulations
(a) The corporation shall provide to each data subject from whom it requests
information to be maintained in a record, at the time of the initial request, the notification described in this subdivision. Where such notification has
been provided, subsequent requests by the corporation for information from the
data subject to be maintained in the same record need not be accompanied by
notification unless the initial notification is not applicable to the
subsequent request. The notification, which shall be in the form shown in
subdivision (b) of this section shall include: (1)
the name of the corporation and any
subdivision within the corporation that is requesting the personal information
and the name or title of the system of records in which such information will
be maintained; (2)
the title, business address and telephone number of the corporation official who is
responsible for the system of records; (3)
the authority granted by law, which
authorizes the collection and maintenance of the information; (4)
the effects on such data subject, if any, of not providing all or any part of the requested information; (5)
the principal purpose or purposes for
which the information is to be collected; and
(6)
the uses which may be made of the
information pursuant to paragraphs (a)(2), (5) and (6) of section
2053.4
of this Part. (b) Privacy law notification. The

United Nations Development Corporation is requesting personal information from
you pursuant to authority derived from the corporation's enabling legislation, chapter 345 of the Laws of 1968, as amended. The purpose for which the
information is collected is to enable the corporation to carry out its
operations effectively. The information requested from you will be used by the
officers and employees of, and those who contract with, the corporation as
necessary in the performance of their official duties pursuant to the
corporation's enabling legislation. This information will be maintained in
__________
(identify system of record) by
______
(title) at
______________
Notes

2053.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
